Title: BGMI COD
Description: Experience the thrill of competitive gaming with Battle Royale or tactical shooter modes in BGMI (Battlegrounds Mobile India) or Call of Duty. Participants will battle it out in teams to claim the ultimate victory, showcasing their gaming skills, strategy, and teamwork.

Title: Mini Militia
Description: Dive into the fun and fast-paced world of Mini Militia, a multiplayer combat game where participants can test their reflexes and strategic thinking. Compete in thrilling matches and aim for the top spot in this exciting competition.

Title: Smash Carts
Description: Unleash chaos and fun in Smash Carts, a dynamic game where players control their customized carts and battle it out in an action-packed arena. Use power-ups and strategies to outmaneuver opponents and emerge victorious.

Title: Fete Games
Description: Step into a world of fun and frolic with a variety of fete games. From ring toss to balloon darts, enjoy light-hearted and entertaining activities that challenge your skills while providing endless enjoyment.

Title: Darts
Description: Test your precision and aim in this classic darts game. Participants will compete to score the highest points by hitting the target with accuracy, making it a perfect blend of skill and fun.
